resources.string: Thank you for your donation and have fun with MobileMic .
AcousticEchoCancelation is not available for this device
Use your smartphone as a microphone in conjunction with a Bluetooth Box .

You do not just fast times a Microphone System with speakers on hand ? but Are in the situation to a group of people to talk to and are afraid that you can not understand all listeners well. MobileMic help you in this situation . Clasp a Bluetooth speaker to your Smartphone and activate the microphone of your smartphone by MobileMic. Features: - Acoustic Echo Cancellation : Not all smartphones have this feature . Unfortunately, it also comes with this function to light echoes, depending on the volume and the distance between smartphone and speakers. Supported smartphones: - Nexus 5x - Seeking tester and ask for feedback
